parameter.name: cellId
parameter.label: Cell-ID
parameter.description: ID of the area to retrieve weather warnings. For a list of valid IDs look at https://www.dwd.de/DE/leistungen/opendata/help/warnungen/cap_warncellids_csv.csv, only IDs starting with an 8 (exception for Berlin: 7) are supported. With the % sign at the end it is possible to query multiple cells at once. For example with 8111% are cells retrieved that starts with 8111.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh in Minutes
parameter.description: Time between to API requests in minutes. Minimum 15 minutes.

parameter.name: warningCount
parameter.label: Number of Provided Warnings
parameter.description: Number of warnings to provide. For each warning there will multiple channels. The warnings are sorted by severity first and begin second so the first warning is always the one with the highest severity.

channel-type.label: Last Updated
channel-type.description: Timestamp of the last update from the endpoint.

channel-type.label: Warning
channel-type.description: ON if a warning is present, OFF else. While be switched to ON only after all other channels - except the trigger channel - are updated. Will be switched to OFF before all other channels are updated to UNDEF.

channel-type.label: Updated
channel-type.description: Triggers NEW if a warning is send the first time. This happens after all other channels are populated.

channel-type.label: Severity
channel-type.description: Severity of the warning. Possible values are Minor, Moderate, Severe and Extreme.

channel-type.label: Valid From
channel-type.description: Start Date and Time for which the warning is valid.

channel-type.label: Valid To
channel-type.description: End Date and Time for which the warning is valid.

channel-type.label: Headline
channel-type.description: Headline of the warning like "Amtliche Warnung vor FROST".

channel-type.label: Type
channel-type.description: Type of the warning, e.g. FROST.

channel-type.label: Height (from)
channel-type.description: Lower Height above sea level for which the warning is valid.

channel-type.label: Height (to)
channel-type.description: Upper Height above sea level for which the warning is valid.

channel-type.label: Urgency
channel-type.description: Urgency of the warning. Possible values are Immediate and Future.
